translations.translation: For we had led you astray. In fact we ourselves were astray."
So we led you astray; we ourselves were strayed.”
We mislead you and we ourselves had also gone astray."
“We therefore led you astray, for we ourselves were astray!”
So we led you astray because we were ourselves astray."
So we led you astray, for we ourselves were erring.
Therefore we perverted you, and we ourselves were perverts.'
Thus we misled you. Lo! we were (ourselves) astray.
We led you astray as we were ourselves astray."
We seduced you astray; verily we were ourselves the seduced ones.
So we perverted you, for we were perverse [ourselves].’
We led you astray: for truly we were ourselves astray."
So we led you astray because we were ourselves astray."
we perverted you, indeed, we were perverts'
We seduced you. We were seducers.”
And we led you to deviation; indeed, we were deviators."
[37:32] So we led you astray — the reason for which is given by their saying — indeed we [ourselves] were astray’.
(Thus we misled you) from Religion. (Lo! we were (ourselves) astray) from Religion.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: سلمنا أنا أضللناكم عن الهدى بمكرنا وخداعنا { فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ } عن التوحيد والإيمان { إِنَّا كُنَّا } أيضاً { غَاوِينَ } [الصافات: 32] أمثالكم، فلحق بنا ما لحق بكم، إلى متى تعييروننا وتخاصموننا؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ثم قالوا لضعفائهم: { فأغويناكم } فدعوناكم إلى الغي { إِنا كنا غَاوِينَ } فأردنا إغواءكم لتكونوا مثلنا، { فإِنهم } أي: الأتباع والمتبوعين جميعاً، { في العذاب يومئذٍ مشترِكون } كما كانوا مشتركين في الغواية
